participant_1.background:
I enjoy taking my dog to the farmers market on the weekends.
i love the country but enjoy visiting the city life.
I want to find a way to keep my curly hair in place.
I am a police officer who has to run after criminals in my boots, but I still enjoy playing basketball in my free time.
i don t like broccoli.

participant_2.background:
My family is close because we like the same things, like Disney movies.
i work as a waitress.
I've been with my husband for 5 years and we love to cosplay together.
i have entered into many violin competitions before and have placed in a few of them.
I decided to move to Salt Lake City to be with my girlfriend.

content.text: Hi, I'm doing great! How about you?
What do you do for fun?
I love to play basketball and go to the farmers market with my dog.
That sounds fun! I love going to the farmers market too. I also like to go to Disney movies with my family.
That sounds really nice! I've never been to a Disney movie.
Oh my gosh, you're missing out! They're so much fun!
I'll have to check one out sometime.
You should! They're great for all ages.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to cosplay with my husband. We've been together for 5 years and we love doing it together.
That sounds really cool! I've never done cosplay before.
You should try it sometime! It's a lot of fun.
I'll have to look into it.
You should! It's a lot of fun
